data.actual_result: Empty space where the navigation bar would be located
data.expected_result: No empty space where the navigation bar would be like when you are long pressing on a user or filtering recent mentions
data.short_description: Empty space for long press menus, S8/Note 8 only
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord and double tap to hide the navigation bar (if you have hide button disabled then go to Settings > Display > Navigation bar) - Long press on a server icon, channel, category or message
